item.text: Jesus called his 12 disciples and gave them authority over unclean spirits so they could cast them out and heal every kind of disease and sickness.

<st data-num="1161" class="">Now</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">these</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="3686" class="">names</st> of the <st data-num="1427" class="">12</st> <st data-num="652" class="">apostles:</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4413" class="">first</st>, <st data-num="4613" class="">Simon</st><n id="2" /> (<st data-num="3004">called</st> <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter)</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="406" class="">Andrew</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="80" class="">brother;</st> <st data-num="2385" class="">James</st> son of <st data-num="2199" class="">Zebedee</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2491" class="">John</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="80" class="">brother;</st>

<st data-num="5376" class="">Philip</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="918" class="">Bartholomew;</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2381" class="">Thomas</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3156" class="">Matthew</st> <st data-num="3588">the</st> <st data-num="5057">tax collector</st>;<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2385" class="">James</st> <st data-num="3588">the</st> son of <st data-num="256" class="">Alphaeus</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2280" class="">Thaddaeus;</st><n id="4" />
Simon the Zealot and Judas Iscariot, who betrayed him.
Jesus sent out these 12, instructing them as follows: “Do not go on a road that leads to Gentile regions and do not enter any Samaritan town.

<st data-num="4198" class="">Go</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3123" class="">instead</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="3588">the</st> <st data-num="622" class="">lost</st> <st data-num="4263" class="">sheep</st><n id="2" /> of the <st data-num="3624" class="">house</st> of <st data-num="2474" class="">Israel</st>.

As you <st data-num="4198" class="">go</st>, <st data-num="2784" class="">preach</st> this <st data-num="3004">message</st>: ‘<st data-num="3588" class="">The</st> <st data-num="932" class="">kingdom</st> of <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st> is <st data-num="1448" class="">near!’</st>

<st data-num="2323" class="">Heal</st> the <st data-num="770" class="">sick</st>, <st data-num="1453" class="">raise</st> the <st data-num="3498" class="">dead</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2511" class="">cleanse</st> <st data-num="3015" class="">lepers</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1544">cast out</st> <st data-num="1140" class="">demons</st>. <st data-num="1432" class="">Freely</st> you <st data-num="2983" class="">received</st>, <st data-num="1432" class="">freely</st> <st data-num="1325" class="">give</st>.

Do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2932" class="">take</st> <st data-num="5557" class="">gold</st>, <st data-num="696" class="">silver</st>, <st data-num="3366" class="">or</st> <st data-num="5475" class="">copper</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="2223" class="">belts</st>;

<st data-num="3361" class="">no</st> <st data-num="4082" class="">bag</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1519">for</st> the <st data-num="3598" class="">journey</st>; <st data-num="3366" class="">or</st> an <st data-num="1417" class="">extra</st> <st data-num="5509" class="">tunic</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3366" class="">or</st> <st data-num="5266" class="">sandals</st> <st data-num="3366" class="">or</st> <st data-num="4464" class="">staff</st>;<n id="3" /> <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> <st data-num="3588">the</st> <st data-num="2040" class="">worker</st> <st data-num="514" class="">deserves</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="5160" class="">provisions</st>.

<st data-num="3739">Whenever</st><n id="1" /> you <st data-num="1525" class="">enter</st> a <st data-num="4172" class="">town</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="2968" class="">village</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1833">find out</st> <st data-num="5101" class="">who</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="514" class="">worthy</st> <st data-num="2546" class="">there</st><n id="3" /> and <st data-num="3306" class="">stay</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="2193" class="">until</st> you <st data-num="1831" class="">leave</st>.
As you <st data-num="1525" class="">enter</st> <st data-num="3588">the</st> <st data-num="3614" class="">house</st>, <st data-num="782">greet</st> those within <st data-num="846">it</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="1437" class="">if</st> <st data-num="3588">the</st> <st data-num="3614" class="">house</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="514" class="">worthy</st>, let <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="1515" class="">peace</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="1437" class="">if</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="514" class="">worthy</st>, let <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="1515" class="">peace</st> <st data-num="1994" class="">return</st> <st data-num="4314">to</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> if <st data-num="3739" class="">anyone</st> will <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1209" class="">welcome</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="191" class="">listen</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3056" class="">message</st>, <st data-num="1621" class="">shake</st> <st data-num="3588">the</st> <st data-num="2868" class="">dust</st> <st data-num="1621">off</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="4228" class="">feet</st> as <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1831" class="">leave</st> <st data-num="1565" class="">that</st> <st data-num="3614" class="">house</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> that <st data-num="4172" class="">town</st>.
I tell you the truth, it will be more bearable for the region of Sodom and Gomorrah on the day of judgment than for that town!
“I am sending you out like sheep surrounded by wolves, so be wise as serpents and innocent as doves.

<st data-num="4337" class="">Beware</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="575" class="">of</st> <st data-num="444" class="">people</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">because</st> they will <st data-num="3860" class="">hand</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3860">over</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="4892" class="">councils</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3146" class="">flog</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="4864" class="">synagogues</st>.<n id="4" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> you will be <st data-num="71" class="">brought</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">before</st> <st data-num="2232" class="">governors</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="935" class="">kings</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1752" class="">because</st> of <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>, <st data-num="1519" class="">as</st> a <st data-num="3142" class="">witness</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> to <st data-num="3588">the</st> <st data-num="1484" class="">Gentiles</st>.

<st data-num="3752" class="">Whenever</st><n id="1" /> they <st data-num="3860" class="">hand</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3860">over</st> <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> trial,<n id="2" /> do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3309" class="">worry</st> about <st data-num="4459" class="">how</st> to speak <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="5101" class="">what</st> to <st data-num="2980" class="">say</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> <st data-num="5101" class="">what</st> you should <st data-num="2980" class="">say</st> will be <st data-num="1325" class="">given</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">at</st> <st data-num="1565" class="">that</st> <st data-num="5610" class="">time</st>.<n id="4" />
For it is not you speaking, but the Spirit of your Father speaking through you.
“Brother will hand over brother to death, and a father his child. Children will rise against parents and have them put to death.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> you will <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="3404" class="">hated</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">by</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">everyone</st> <st data-num="1223">because of</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st>. <st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="3588">the one who</st> <st data-num="5278" class="">endures</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="5056" class="">end</st> will <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="4982" class="">saved</st>!
Whenever they persecute you in one town, flee to another! I tell you the truth, you will not finish going through all the towns of Israel before the Son of Man comes.
“A disciple is not greater than his teacher, nor a slave greater than his master.

It is enough for the disciple to become like his teacher, and the slave like his master. If they have called the head of the house ‘Beelzebul,’ how much worse will they call the members of his household!
“Do not be afraid of them, for nothing is hidden that will not be revealed, and nothing is secret that will not be made known.

<st data-num="3739" class="">What</st> I <st data-num="3004" class="">say</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3588">the</st> <st data-num="4653" class="">dark</st>, <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3588">the</st> <st data-num="5457" class="">light</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">what</st> is <st data-num="191" class="">whispered</st> <st data-num="1519">in</st> your <st data-num="3775" class="">ear</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2784" class="">proclaim</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">from</st> <st data-num="3588">the</st> <st data-num="1430" class="">housetops</st>.<n id="2" />

Do<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> be <st data-num="5399" class="">afraid</st> <st data-num="575">of</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">those who</st> <st data-num="615" class="">kill</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="4983" class="">body</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="3361 1410">cannot</st> <st data-num="615" class="">kill</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="5590" class="">soul</st>. <st data-num="3123">Instead</st>, <st data-num="5399" class="">fear</st> <st data-num="3588">the one who</st> is <st data-num="1410" class="">able</st> to <st data-num="622" class="">destroy</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">both</st> <st data-num="5590" class="">soul</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4983" class="">body</st> <st data-num="1722">in</st> <st data-num="1067">hell</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="3780">Aren’t</st> <st data-num="1417" class="">two</st> <st data-num="4765" class="">sparrows</st> <st data-num="4453" class="">sold</st> for a <st data-num="787" class="">penny</st>?<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">Yet</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="4098" class="">falls</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">to</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="1093" class="">ground</st> <st data-num="427">apart</st> from <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3962">Father’s</st> will.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="1161">Even</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="3588">the</st> <st data-num="2359" class="">hairs</st> on <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="2776" class="">head</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="705" class="">numbered</st>.
So do not be afraid; you are more valuable than many sparrows.
“Whoever, then, acknowledges me before people, I will acknowledge before my Father in heaven.
But whoever denies me before people, I will deny him also before my Father in heaven.
“Do not think that I have come to bring peace to the earth. I have not come to bring peace but a sword!
For I have come to set a man against his father, a daughter against her mother, and a daughter-in-law against her mother-in-law,
and a man’s enemies will be the members of his household.
“Whoever loves father or mother more than me is not worthy of me, and whoever loves son or daughter more than me is not worthy of me.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">whoever</st> does <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2983">take up</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="4716" class="">cross</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="190" class="">follow</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="514" class="">worthy</st> of <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>.
Whoever finds his life will lose it, and whoever loses his life because of me will find it.
“Whoever receives you receives me, and whoever receives me receives the one who sent me.

<st data-num="3588">Whoever</st> <st data-num="1209" class="">receives</st> a <st data-num="4396" class="">prophet</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st> of a <st data-num="4396" class="">prophet</st> will <st data-num="2983" class="">receive</st> a <st data-num="4396" class="">prophet’s</st> <st data-num="3408" class="">reward</st>. <st data-num="3588">Whoever</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1209" class="">receives</st> a <st data-num="1342" class="">righteous person</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st> of a <st data-num="1342">righteous person</st> will <st data-num="2983" class="">receive</st> a <st data-num="1342">righteous person’s</st> <st data-num="3408" class="">reward</st>.
And whoever gives only a cup of cold water to one of these little ones in the name of a disciple, I tell you the truth, he will never lose his reward.”
